type DataGridViewTextBoxEditingControl = class inherit TextBox interface IDataGridViewEditingControl

summary.span: 表示可以承载于 中的文本框控件。

span.span: Represents a text box control that can be hosted in a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类是专用化的类型实现控件接口，从而使其可以承载于当单元格处于编辑模式。The class is a specialized type of control that implements the interface, allowing it to be hosted in a when the cell is in edit mode. 处理事件时要执行的编辑控件的自定义初始化的单元格进入编辑模式。Handle the event to perform custom initialization of the editing control when a cell enters edit mode. 若要自定义控件的显示特性，请设置返回的对象的属性属性，而无需设置返回的控件属性属性。To customize the display characteristics of the control, set the properties of the object returned by the property rather than setting the properties of the control returned by the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此默认构造函数设置属性设置为`false`。This default constructor sets the property to `false`. 应用程序代码通常不会显式创建此类的实例自动执行此操作时，因为其中包含或创建。Application code typically won't explicitly create instances of this class, because this is performed automatically when the containing or is created.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 新对象才可用于从.NET Framework 4.7.2 开始的.NET framework 目标版本重新编译应用程序。The new object is only available in applications that are recompiled to target versions of the .NET Framework starting with the .NET Framework 4.7.2. 面向.NET Framework 的早期版本，但在.NET Framework 4.7.2 上运行应用程序可以选择启用此功能通过兼容性开关。Applications that target an earlier version of the .NET Framework but are running on the .NET Framework 4.7.2 can opt in to this feature by using a compatibility switch. 有关其他信息，请参阅[What's New in.NET Framework 中辅助功能](https://docs.microsoft.com/dotnet/framework/whats-new/whats-new-in-accessibility)。For additional information, see [What's New in Accessibility in the .NET Framework](https://docs.microsoft.com/dotnet/framework/whats-new/whats-new-in-accessibility).

summary.span: 获取或设置文本框控件的当前值的格式化表示形式。

span.span: Gets or sets the formatted representation of the current value of the text box control.

value.span: 表示此控件的当前值的对象。

span.span: An object representing the current value of this control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性包含该控件包含的实际数据。The property contains the actual data contained by the control. 数据是在控件的文本框中显示的字符串。The data is the string shown in the text box of the control. 与此相反，属性是此字符串的格式化表示形式。In contrast, the property is the formatted representation of this string. 由于文本框中使用纯文本字符串，这两个属性是实质上是相同的。Since a text box uses plain text strings, these two properties are essentially the same.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 列标题行的行索引为-1。The row index for the column headers row is -1. 共享行的行索引还为-1。The row index for a shared row is also -1.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示文本框控件的当前值是否已更改。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the current value of the text box control has changed.

value.span: 如果控件的值已更改，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the value of the control has changed; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性设置为`true`以指示所属单元格的值已更改，并且该单元格可能需要进行更新以反映此值中的更改。The property is set to `true` to indicate that the owning cell's value has changed, and the cell may need to be updated to reflect this change in value. 所属单元格或表将重置此属性设置为`false`后更新自身。The owning cell or table will reset this property to `false` after it has updated itself. 初始化控件时，此属性设置为`false`。When the control is initialized, this property is set to `false`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法可确保，ENTER 键，以便回车符和换行符不存储在单元格的值将被忽略。This method ensures that the ENTER key is ignored so that carriage return and line feeds aren't stored in the cell value. 此方法还允许在单元格内容时按下 CTRL + A 选择。This method also allows the cell contents to be selected when CTRL+A is pressed.

permission.span: 对于直接调用方使用此方法。

span.span: for immediate callers to use this method.
